function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inter-agency governance compensating for lack of training and network-related capital, leading to improved coordination and response to crisis situations.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential for transmission of contagious diseases in urban green spaces during a time of social crisis.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Governance challenges in managing urban green spaces during the covid-19 pandemic.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Close proximity within the white circles could lead to increased spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited access and multiple entry points may lead to inconsistent enforcement of mask-wearing and temperature checks, increasing the risk of contagious disease spread.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Encouraging physical interaction through the use of mirrors and banners could lead to unintended close contact and potential spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Closure of parks with physical barriers and instruction not to visit other parks may lead to overcrowding in the open parks.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Pilot opening of parks without monitoring precautions may lead to non-compliance with safety measures.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conversion of roads to pedestrian areas may lead to increased interaction and close contact among pedestrians.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of personnel to monitor protocol compliance","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient communication and awareness","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Non-compliance with protocol by park visitors","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective park closure as a response to controlling contagion.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Closure of parks not enforced","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of personnel to enforce safety protocols","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Desire to open parks without adequate safety measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased demand for park access leading to overcrowding","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mental health issues due to restricted access to green spaces","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate resources for maintaining safe park environments","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of access to parks leading to mental health issues, physical inactivity, and domestic violence consequences","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Crowding in less ventilated and denser spaces due to park closures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Closure of small gyms leading to reliance on crowded parks for exercise","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Scarce personnel to monitor compliance with protocols","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Non-compliance with curfew measures and park restrictions","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Demand for park access leading to non-compliance with safety measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Social resistance to following minimal protocol requests such as mask use and distancing.","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Vandalism of warning resources such as yellow ribbons and banners.","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Crowding in restricted areas and resistance to park closures by some users.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Non-compliance with closure rules and mobility restrictions","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementation of restrictions around urban green spaces leading to complaints from drivers and traffic accidents","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Vandalism of yellow ribbons used to enclose restricted areas","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Evasion of restrictions by young people during nights","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impromptu protocols and loose guidelines from national governments may lead to ineffective or insufficient protocols for using public spaces, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Difficulty in adapting personnel to perform new tasks may lead to inadequate enforcement of disease prevention measures and inefficient management of public events.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Uncertainty about the duration of the measures may lead to inadequate long-term planning, affecting budget allocation and personnel tasks.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Decrease in funding for public agencies responsible for urban green spaces may result in insufficient resources to implement effective disease prevention measures and maintain the facilities.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Differences in enforcement leading to varying levels of actual mobility","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inconsistent communication and response to pandemic urgency","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Challenges in designing mobility protocols for urban green spaces","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of enforcement of social distancing measures in public spaces","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inconsistent implementation of lockdown directives and measures","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Delay in implementing social distancing measures in some countries","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risk of transmission of contagious diseases in crowded urban green spaces","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of financial instability due to covid-19 impact on visitor numbers and funding sources","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of community transmission and outbreak in nearby communities due to park-related activities","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on permits and services for park funding","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of biodiversity protection in urban green spaces","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Coordination challenges in polycentric park management","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of focus on the role of green areas in disease propagation","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of dedicated park management","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"}]}
